apps.name: Spotify Eevee
apps.versionDescription: This tweak makes Spotify think that you have a Premium subscription, granting free listening, just like Spotilife.
apps.localizedDescription: This tweak makes Spotify think that you have a Premium subscription, granting free listening, just like Spotilife.

versions.localizedDescription:
Genius Fallback: Load lyrics from Genius if there is a problem with LRCLIB or Musixmatch
Updated OpenSpotifySafariExtension: Now supports all Spotify links and works great
Dark PopUps optionImproved lyrics colors (not so light and washed out, looks more like the original)
Improved song search algorithm on Genius or LRCLIB
Fixed EeveeSpotify settings crash when tapping on tabbar
Updated Musixmatch token alert message; the tweak now allows you to paste debug info
